    • Method Detail

      • onStartUp

        public java.util.List onStartUp()
        This function retrieves a list of reservations
        Returns:
        - A list of reservations.

      • createReservationBooking

        public boolean createReservationBooking(Reservation reservation,
                               int reservationExpiryMintue)
        This function verifies the user input to ensure that the restaurant is able to accommodate the expected number of people. Also to ensure that the booking time is can only be made in advance.
        Parameters:
        reservation - - A reservation to be created.
        reservationExpiryMintue - - A number of minutes the restaurant allows the customer to be late.
        Returns:
        True means the reservation is made successfully. False means that the reservation has failed to be created.

      • removeReservationBooking

        public boolean removeReservationBooking(Reservation reservation)
        This function removes the reservation and update the table accordingly to release it for reservation.
        Parameters:
        reservation - - A reservation to be removed.
        Returns:
        True means that the reservation has be removed successfully. False means that the reservation has failed to be removed.

      • checkReservationBooking

        public boolean checkReservationBooking(Reservation reservation,
                              int reservationExpiryMinute)
        This function checks if the reservation has expired pass the allowed timing. If the reservation has expired pass the allowed timing, remove the reservation.
        Parameters:
        reservation - - A reservation to be checked.
        reservationExpiryMintue - - A number of minutes the restaurant allows the customer to be late.
        Returns:
        True means the reservation has expired past the allowed timing and removed successfully. False means that the reservation has not expired past the allowed timing.
